name: 420 Merchant Solutions
tag_list: medical-marijuana, mmj, 420-merchant, 420-credit-cards, 420-merchant-solutions, credit-card-processing, merchant-solutions, medical-marijuana-credit-card, medical-marijuana-processing, credit-card-processing-for-medical-marijuana, medical-marijuana-proces
overview: 420 Merchant is a group of experienced card payment processing professionals specializing in assisting businesses increase their accessibility, productivity and revenue by offering a pin based debit card processing solutions. 420Merchant has been working with banks to create a perfect program for the medical marijuana industry. We are proud to introduce our compassionate program to collectives and canna businesses across the country.
